Quick search

Module: phaseslope¶

This module allows to run the phase-slope correction offline. It requires additional software and is only needed for data prior to the start of the survey.

Reference¶

class apercal.modules.phaseslope.phaseslope(file_=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Phaseslope class. Correct the phase slope in SVC data

correct_phaseslope()[source]¶

Splits out a certain frequency range from the datasets

go()[source]¶

Executes the split step with the parameters indicated in the config-file

reset()[source]¶

Function to reset the current step and remove all generated data. Be careful! Deletes all data generated in this step!
